scripts.install: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn install" "cd backend && yarn install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn start" "cd backend && yarn start:dev"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn test" "cd backend && yarn test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn lint" "cd backend && yarn lint"
scripts.pretty: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn pretty" "cd backend && yarn pretty"
